subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary objective of the Union Budget?
question_hi: संयुक्त वित्तीय विभागीय क्या काम करता है?
explanation_en: The primary objective of the Union Budget is to stimulate job growth and promote economic and industrial development.
The primary objective of the Union Budget is to increase tax revenues and improve financial health of the government.
explanation_hi: संयुक्त विभागीय और ऑनिवृत्ति और प्रत्यामीय और कार्यक्रम
